channel.title: Pages on Fools 100
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Fools 100

item.title: Gear up!
item.description: Here is a list of suggested gears you should consider bringing: Headlamp with front and back lights (2x or with spare battery) Food Water (1.5L or more) 2 or 3 pair of socks Cash (eg 100 euros), credit card, ID for food, train and possibly taxi Fuly charged phone Waterproof jacket with head cap / raincoat Waterproof pants Hicking or trail running shoes Ziplock bags to keep things like keys, mask, emergency toilet paper/wipe Warm sweater Gloves First aid kit, whistle, survival blanket Anti schaf wax Hat/Buff or sunscreen Blister treatment (eg Compeed, tape) Walking sticks Fusspuder, vaseline, repaircreme GPS Watch Ibuprofen USB Battery pack Here are couple of examples:
